mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (login_id, password, email, nickname, role, status) VALUE (#{user.loginId}, #{user.password}, #{user.email}, #{user.nickname}, 'USER', 'ACTIVATE')
mapper.select: SELECT id, login_id, password, email, profile_img, nickname, created_at, updated_at, role, status FROM Users WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND status = 'ACTIVATE'
